channel.title: Abouts on Kunhao Zheng

item.title: About Me
item.description: I am a 4th-year student in École Polytechnique in France, enrolled in the “Cycle Ingénieur” Program. I am also a 2nd-year Master student in Shanghai Jiao Tong University as part of my double-degree program supervised by Ya Zhang. I am currently working as a research intern at Sea AI Lab in Singapore, under the guidance of Lin Min and Wang Yangzihao. I am working on a project that accelerates deep learning compiler (XLA) optimization and other interesting stuffs.
